doc:
Mickey McBan https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mickey_McBan 0 Mickey McBan (February 27, 1919 – October 30, 1979) was an American child actor. He began his acting career at the age of four and specialized in portraying the everyday youngster in many films. McBan never made the transition to portraying adults and his screen career was already over by 1929. Mickey_McBan ( February_27_,_1919 – October_30_,_1979 ) was an_American_child_actor . He began his_acting_career at the_age of four and specialized in portraying the_everyday_youngster in many_films . McBan never_made the_transition to portraying_adults and his_screen_career was already over by 1929 .
